named-query.name: accruedRepo.pageQuery
named-query.query: select c from AccruedVO c left join fetch c.pkCorp left join fetch c.pkOrg left join fetch c.pkChecker left join fetch c.pkGrantor

named-query.name: accruedRepo.findByPk
named-query.query: select c from AccruedChildVO c where c.pkLeaseAccrued =: pk

named-query.name: accruedRepo.findAccrualForAccrued
named-query.query: select vo from AccrualForAccruedPageRefVO vo left join fetch vo.pkCustomer c left join fetch vo.pkContract co left join fetch vo.pkCurrtype cu where vo.pkLesseeProtocol is null and (vo.assetsClassify is null or vo.assetsClassify in (0,1)) and (vo.month <=?1 and vo.month >= vo.mon and vo.ifBegin = 1 ) and (vo.pkContract.contStatus = 2 or vo.pkContract.contStatus = 3) and vo.pkContract.pkAcctOrg = ?2

named-query.name: accruedRepo.getLastAccruedMonth
named-query.query: select max(accrualMonth) as accrualMonth from AccruedDO where pkCorp = ?1 and billstatus = ?2 and contractType = ?3

named-native-query.name: accruedRepo.getGlSyssettledYearMonth
named-native-query.query: select gs.settledyear,gs.settledperiod from gl_syssettled gs left join bd_glorgbook bg on gs.pk_glorgbook = bg.pk_glorgbook left join bd_glorg glo on bg.pk_glorg = glo.pk_glorg where glo.pk_entityorg = ?1

named-query.name: cbOverdueContractRepo.pageQuery
named-query.query: select a from CbOverdueContractVO a left join fetch a.pkCurrency b left join fetch a.pkSys c

named-query.name: cbBadContractRepo.pageQuery
named-query.query: select a from CbBadContractVO a left join fetch a.pkCurrency b left join fetch a.pkSys c

named-query.name: cbEarlySettlementRepo.pageQuery
named-query.query: select a from CbEarlySettlementVO a left join fetch a.pkSys b

named-query.name: cbInvoiceApplyRepo.pageQuery
named-query.query: select a from CbInvoiceApplyDetailVO a left join fetch a.pkSys b
